name: Book Metadata
description: Automatic book and audiobook metadata fetching from Google Books and Open Library
overview: A comprehensive metadata provider for books and audiobooks in Jellyfin. Fetches metadata from Google Books API and Open Library API, with support for ISBN extraction from filenames, title and author fuzzy matching, embedded metadata from EPUB, PDF, and audiobook files, and cover image downloads with configurable provider priorities and rate limiting.

versions.changelog: Initial release with Google Books API integration, Open Library API integration, EPUB/PDF/audiobook metadata extraction, ISBN extraction and fuzzy matching, and cover image support
